title: BRIEF-Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication gets approval to acquire assets
text:
BRIEF-Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication gets approval to acquire assets Sept 24 
Sept 24 Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech Co Ltd 
* Says gets regulatory approval to acquire assets, trading of shares to resume on Sept 25 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1jdug8z 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
